comment.author: 67587725@N02
comment._content: This view looks up Ingliston Street, eventually emerging onto the Pleasance. Immediately behind the photographer is a set of stairs which lead up to Roxburgh Terrace, a raised walkway on Drummond Street. To the left of the photographer is a set of stairs which go down to join Drummond Street. The tenement to the immediate right of the photographer (corner of Roxburgh Terrace and Ingliston Street) had to be demolished September 1960. See link www.flickr.com/photos/sixtiesedinburgh/7094493859/
